statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); blue='\033[2;38;5;117m'; grey='\033[2;38;5;242m'; cyan='\033[2;38;5;159m'; reset='\033[0m'; git_info=""; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo "detached"); dirty=""; if ! git -C "$cwd" -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false diff --quiet 2>/dev/null || ! git -C "$cwd" -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null; then dirty="*"; fi; ahead_behind=$(git -C "$cwd" -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false rev-list --left-right --count HEAD...@{upstream} 2>/dev/null || echo ""); arrows=""; if [ -n "$ahead_behind" ]; then ahead=$(echo "$ahead_behind" | awk '{print $1}'); behind=$(echo "$ahead_behind" | awk '{print $2}'); [ "$behind" != "0" ] && arrows="${arrows}⇣"; [ "$ahead" != "0" ] && arrows="${arrows}⇡"; [ -n "$arrows" ] && arrows="${cyan}:${arrows}${grey}"; fi; git_info=" ${grey}${branch}${dirty}${arrows}${reset}"; fi; printf "${blue}%s${reset}${git_info}  ${grey}%s${reset}\n" "$(basename "$cwd")" "$model"
